item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. ESO telescope captures the most detailed infrared map of the Milky Way (64 points | 3 comments)
2. Boris Vallejo and the pixel art of the demoscene (334 points | 88 comments)
3. SQLitebrowser: First update in three years (July 2024) (28 points | 1 comment)
4. Bop Spotter (2114 points | 344 comments)
5. Dell XPS13 RAM Upgrade (16 points | 5 comments)
6. NewsCatcher News API (YC S22) Is Hiring ( | hide)
7. Multiversion Python Thoughts (77 points | 58 comments)
8. "Comedy is search" – theory on how jokes work (87 points | 55 comments)
9. Show HN: qrframe – generate beautiful qr codes with javascript code (283 points | 45 comments)
10. Ask HN: Should you reply STOP to unwanted texts? (127 points | 151 comments)
11. Essential node in global semiconductor supply chain hit by Hurricane Helene (126 points | 34 comments)
12. Ask HN: What is the best way to learn Erlang? (23 points | 18 comments)
13. PyTorch Native Architecture Optimization: Torchao (129 points | 35 comments)
14. MusicBrainz: An open music encyclopedia (348 points | 78 comments)
15. Show HN: Facad – A colorful directory listing tool for the command line (115 points | 74 comments)
16. Sea robins use leg-like fins to taste, navigate seafloor, researchers discover (8 points | discuss)
17. Show HN: Venator – Open-source threat detection (55 points | discuss)
18. What the Photographer Who's Taken Philosopher Portraits Thinks of Philosophers (8 points | discuss)
19. Vanishing Culture: Preserving Cookbooks (107 points | 70 comments)
20. Launch HN: Inkeep (YC W23) – Copilot for Support (think Cursor for help desks) (111 points | 55 comments)
21. East and Gulf Coast ports strike (7 points | 2 comments)
22. The Case of the Missing Increment (38 points | 9 comments)
23. California bans legacy admissions at private universities (486 points | 512 comments)
24. Phrase matching in Marginalia Search (170 points | 20 comments)
25. Show HN: A macOS app to prevent sound quality degradation on AirPods (183 points | 258 comments)
26. BorgBackup 2.0 supports Rclone – over 70 cloud providers in addition to SSH (209 points | 68 comments)
27. Do AI companies work? (367 points | 380 comments)
28. Ask HN: Any good essays/books/advice about software sales? (189 points | 74 comments)
29. AI chipmaker Cerebras files for IPO (191 points | 105 comments)
30. Keep Track: 3D Satellite Toolkit (165 points | 36 comments)
